basicInfo.name: Vincent Jang
basicInfo.title: Backend Engineer
basicInfo.tagline: Rather than a developer who shines alone, I aspire to be like the moon, harmonizing with the light of others.
basicInfo.introduction: I'm a backend developer passionate about building things I'd actually want to use myself. I thrive on learning new languages and frameworks based on project needs – currently exploring Go, Flutter, and system architecture. I've been creating bugs since 2011 and believe the best projects come from curiosity and solving real problems.

education.school: Seoul National University of Science and Technology
